snippet.title: Untamed Tactics - Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet Mortimer! They will tell you about their epic journey through the perilous yet breathtaking world of the Wild!

Untamed Tactics, an enthralling turn-based RPG experience, will be available for purchase on Steam on August 28, 2023. To learn more about the game and embark on an unforgettable adventure, please visit https://store.steampowered.com/app/1538900/Untamed_Tactics.

Stay connected with us and be part of our community on social media!

🟠 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Play_Untamed
🟢 Join other fans in Discord: https://discord.gg/Rk7Zj4cwU8
🟡 Like Untamed Tactics selfies: https://www.instagram.com/play_untamed
🔵 Share your review on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/untamed
🟣 Find Untamed Tactics on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/untamedthegame
